casebody.data:
ORR STREET LOFTS, LLC, Respondent,
v.
Shey M. STONER and Chance E. Shoemaker, Appellants. WD 80742 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 6, 2018 Zachary Sanders, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellants. Michael Whitworth, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Jill Jackson, Columbia, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Victor C. Howard, and Cynthia L. Martin, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Ms. Shey M. Stoner and Mr. Chance E. Shoemaker appeal a Boone County Circuit Court judgment awarding more than $14,000 to the owner of an apartment they leased but never occupied. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
